name: Splash Wars
short_description:
8 character choices, all between the ages of 8 & 12. Each has their own super splasher technique. Very much comparable to Mortal Combat strengths, agilities, & secret codes for secret shows. There are 4 main themes. Backyard pool, Lake house, Oceanside & indoor pool @ the local YMCA. This is a family game, so no blood, no iffy language, however some innuendoes may be considered. Characters include Chrystal Cannonball - (Cannonball queen)
Larry the Lawnmower-Blade chop with mower through water
Bobby Bandana-Whips bandana in circular motion, repeatedly splashing water in face
Junkman Jason -Tosses trash out of can he wears on head, all over. Scare tactic more than anything. If any germs touch the other player they start losing strength
Spencer Sprinkler-Holds a gallon of water in his mouth & spritz it out like a sprinkler
Linka Sync-Can stop time for 5-7 seconds while dashing splashes & preparing her own
Tippy Hose-Kinks hose for added splash
Jessie Wetsy-Pees in pool if excited
summary: Not such a dry party after all! But it's a family affair.
